summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Erie Avenue, from East Alder Street to the north line of Leschi Park, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2871 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
